name: Mekafusion #18 MF07-OCTOPUS-PRIME
description:
Model: MF07-OCTOPUS-PRIME ( Mekanic Fusion no. 7 - OCTOPUS PRIME )
Series: ANCIENT

Fusions:
BS03-PRIME ( Base Mekanoid no. 3 - PRIME )
MG-OCTOPUS ( Meta Gear - Sentient OCTOPUS )

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Strength, Multi-tasking function
• Weapon: Sentient Tentacles
• Perks: Can withstand multiple foes. Combat with flexibility.

A Mekanic fusion between Base model and An alien sentient Meta Gear Octopus to form Mekafusion in ANCIENT series with its unique AI armed with Tentacles that adapts situations in combat.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Video is created in 2048x2048 pixel resolution in 60 fps made as an iconic figure art collectible.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
